description:
As Gao and his friends celebrate Gaito and Abygale`s reunion, J Genesis unveils his Impact Monster`s new form on live TV. Baku suffers a crisis of confidence. Bal makes contact with a mysterious entity who may hold the keys to J Genesis`s plans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガチヤバ! 必殺のオリジン・ブレイカー!!
